hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
<% if @vars['jobs']['cf-services-contrib-release-tgz'] == 'dev' %> git branch --set-upstream <%= @vars['git_repos']['cf_services_contrib_release']['branch'] %> origin/<%= @vars['git_repos']['cf_services_contrib_release']['branch'] %>
export DEV_RELEASE_YML=$WORKSPACE/config/dev.yml
./update
gem install bosh_cli bosh -n reset release
cat << EOF > $DEV_RELEASE_YML --- dev_name: <%= @vars['cf-services-contrib-release']['dev_name'] %> EOF
bosh -n create release --with-tarball --force
RELEASE_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/dev_releases RELEASE_YML=`ls -t $RELEASE_PATH/<%= @vars['cf-services-contrib-release']['dev_name'] %>/*.yml | tee | head -1`
<% else %>
RELEASE_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/releases LATEST_RELEASE_FILE="$WORKSPACE/latest_release.txt" if [ -f $LATEST_RELEASE_FILE ]; then RELEASE_YML=`cat $LATEST_RELEASE_FILE` else LATEST_RELEASE_GIT=`git rev-list --reverse --tags --max-count=1 releases/*.yml` RELEASE_YML=`git diff-tree --no-commit-id --name-only -r $LATEST_RELEASE_GIT | grep -e 'releases\/cf-services-contrib.*.yml'` fi
<% end %>
bundle update
<% if @vars['http_proxy'] %>http_proxy=<%= @vars['http_proxy'] %><% end %> bosh -n create release $WORKSPACE/$RELEASE_YML --with-tarball
RUBY_SCRIPT="data = YAML::load(STDIN.read); puts \"#{data['name']} #{data['version']}\"" RELEASE_PROPS=`cat $RELEASE_YML | ruby -ryaml -e "$RUBY_SCRIPT"` read RELEASE_NAME RELEASE_VERSION <<<$(echo $RELEASE_PROPS)
echo "${RELEASE_NAME} ${RELEASE_VERSION}" > contrib_services_release_version.txt
mv ${RELEASE_PATH}/${RELEASE_NAME}-${RELEASE_VERSION}.tgz $WORKSPACE/cf-services-contrib-release.tgz
